briefTitle: A Non-inferiority, Comparative Study Between Foraseq®, Eurofarma´s Formoterol/Budesonide and Alenia® in Asthma

outcomeMeasures.title: Forced Expiratory Volume in 1 Second (FEV1) at the Final Visit (FV)
outcomeMeasures.description: The primary efficacy analysis was performed by evaluating non-inferiority of Eurofarma's device compared to Alenia® in relation to FEV1 (in liters) in FV in the PP population

outcomeMeasures.title: FEV1 (L) in VF in the ITT Population, to Assess the Difference Between the Three Groups
outcomeMeasures.description: The mean FEV1 (L) in VF were compared between the three groups using the nonparametric Kruskal-Walllis test and the ITT population. A nonparametric test was used since the variable did not show normal distribution in the Foraseq® group.

commonTop: Left and posterior knee trauma infection
